subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Five finalists for the Golf Digest United States Open Challenge were named Thursday, selected from 56,374 entries. The winning finalist will play Torrey Pines Golf Course in San Diego, the site of the 2008 United States Open, on the Friday before the first round of the championship. An hourlong show documenting the round will be broadcast June 15, as a lead-in to NBC’s live coverage of the final round. The winner will be determined by online ballots cast March 28 to April 30 by voters 18 or older at gdopencontest.com.
